General.Name: Unique Optical Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Unique Opto-Electronics Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, processes, and trades in various optical glasses, optical lenses, lens blanks, and prism blanks in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in cameras, camcorders, telescopes, microscopes, condensers, projectors, fax machines, copiers, scanners, monitors, digital cameras, measuring instruments, military observation equipment, medical endoscopes, camera phones, and optical communication products. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Nantou, Taiwan.
